divs: Sighting DetailsI left work at 12am as I work 4pm till 12am, I work in Union ville which is approx 15 mins from port Jervis were I live, the quickest route is to take the Minisink turnpike then to the Greenville turnpike, I was driving on the Minisink turnpike when I noticed lights in the sky, firstly I thought it was a plane then I noticed it had 5 lights on it from end to end the lights went from blue-white-red-white-blue in that order but the strangest thing was it was turning clockwise slowly and the only sound I could hear was like a cat purring, I slowed the car down to around 20 mph to get a better look then I noticed the size it must of been around 200 feet in length, I proceeded to speed up as I started to get nervous but as it passed over the car the car turned off I came to a stop and grabbed my cell phone and noticed that had turned off too, by this time I didn't know weather to get out of the car and run or stay in my car before I came to the decision the lights had gone out and the car started up I put my foot down a sped up the road not looking back I tell you it was the most unnerving things to happen to me.
Summary: The object was approx 200 feet in length and there was 5 lights on it blue, white, red, white, blue.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Port Jervis
There were no other sightings in Port Jervis on or around November 25th 2009
